features.additionalInfo: You can do your everyday banking through Bankwest Online Banking and the Bankwest App from anywhere, 24/7 - it's easy and secure.
This means you can receive faster payments into this account, often in real time. Keep in mind - this account isn't eligible for PayID.
Additional borrowings - borrow up to 120% of value of your security.
Make extra payments - pay more than your minimum repayments as and when you choose.
Great fixed rate - have peace of mind knowing exactly what your repayments will be.
Repayment options that suit you. Choose the loan term - from three to seven years - and repayment frequency.
Access surplus funds 24/7 - redraw online and on the go with the Bankwest App.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Regular income of over $20,000 a year.
Available to Australian citizens or permanent residents and to New Zealand citizens residing in Australia.
The Bankwest Secured Car Loan is an account for personal customers who are over 18 years of age.
As security for the loan, we accept: - Cars or motorcycles that are less than seven years old; OR - Cars or motorcycles that are valued at least $10,000.
Applications for Personals Loans are subject to the Bank's normal credit approval.

fees.name: Repeat statement of account fee
fees.additionalInfo: Cost is per statement and payable on customer request to issue a copy of the current or a previously issued statement.

fees.name: Statement Faxing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Cost is per statements when a customer requests for a statement to be faxed.

fees.name: Bank Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request a bank cheque.

fees.name: Registration of financing statement or amendment of financing statement
Request information under s275 PPSA
fees.additionalInfo: If time spent is less than 0.5 hour; thereafter $60.00 per hour or part thereof.

fees.name: Arrears Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Cost is per notice and payable upon notification that your account is in arrears, during the period the loan is in default.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on issue of a statutory default notice, during the period the loan is in default.

fees.name: Early Repayment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you repay your loan within the first 24 months from the date the loan, or any part, is advanced.

fees.name: Loan Maintenance Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable monthly in arrears on the monthly repayment due date.

data.name: Secured Car Loan
data.description: Our Secured Loan is great for purchasing new or used vehicles. You can also choose to secure your loan against your car for other purposes including home improvements, debt consolidation or travel expenses.
